text: Imtixaamana Agoonta markay Gaadhaan Guur Haddaad ku Aragtaan (Ogaataan) Rashiidnimo (Wanaag) siiya iyaga Xoolahooda hana u Cunina Xad gudub iyo ka degdagis intayna Weynaana, Ruuxii Hodan ah ha dhawrsado Ruuxii Faqiir ahna ha ka Cuno si Wanaagsan, markaad u Dhiibtaan Xoolahooda Marag u yeela Koriisa, waana ku Filanyahay Eebe Xisaabiye
